entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Arm64/Sve: ConditionalSelect(LoadVector*NonFaultingSignExtend*) codegen #102904
  • .NET 8 application crashes on startup with error code 0x80008093 #102898
  • Q: System.Diagnostics.Activity out of proc monitoring value conversion culture variance #102896
    Future
  • System.Diagnostics.Activity out of proc sampling #102895
    Future
  • [wasi] `async`/`await` on WASI #102894
    9.0.0
  • AOT warnings reported on partial classes #102893
  • [Mono] Using managed function pointers in non-llvm mixed AOT + interpreted environments leads to crashes #102891
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: expose funtionality found in: public static bool JsonReaderHelper.UnescapeAndCompare(ReadOnlySpan<byte> utf8Source, ReadOnlySpan<byte> other) #102890
    Future
  • Confused about NuGet package versions #102889
  • DI behavior change between .NET 7.0 and .NET 8.0 #102888
  • [HttpStress] `H3_FRAME_ERROR` in Post Duplex Slow #102880
    9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: SveLoadMaskedUnOpTest.template needs more scenario #102878
  • Parameter name stripping breaks debugger #102873
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT generates native object without correct prefix #102869
    Future
  • Test failure: Loader/classloader/explicitlayout/Regressions/13362/Github13362/Github13362.cmd #102868
  • BadImageFormatException when mixing AOT and Interpreter assemblies #102867
  • Avoid instrumenting methods which trigger MinOpts #102863
    Future
  • Very Long JIT Times During ETW Rundown #102858

Closed

  • Add a generic host lifetime for Windows Forms #35998
    Future
  • GeneratedRegex generated class missing [Serializable] attribute #102892
  • LibraryImportGenerator unit test segfault illegal memory access #89054
  • ILLink shoud keep all metadata for rooted members #81979
    9.0.0
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder writes corrupt metadata tokens to IL stream for arrays of newly-declared types #102687
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] conflicting signatures for UCO #102844
    9.0.0
  • Version number on NuGet #102871
  • [API Proposal]: Add MediaTypeNames.Text.EventStream for server-sent events #102194
    9.0.0
  • 'Content-Length' header not always returned when enumerating HttpContentHeaders #16162
    9.0.0
  • Exception in BlazorWasm applications due to NullabilityInfoContext usage #102848
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Optimize counted loops by reversing them #100915
    9.0.0
  • Can "Math.DivRem" do division operation only once? #4155
    Future
  • Crash while jitting System.Runtime.Intrinsics tests in `Rationalizer::RewriteHWIntrinsicAsUserCall` #102840
    9.0.0
  • Tensor tests failing under jitstress with "Assertion failed 'gtEntryPoint == nullptr'" #102839
    9.0.0
  • When does the.NET SDK release support 26100? #102861
  • `LibraryImport` do not copy `this` #102690
    9.0.0
  • [Feature request]: Support instrumentation scope attributes on ActivitySource #93795
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Arm64/Sve: Implement LoadVector*NonFaultingSignExtendTo* APIs #102903
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Expose additional metadata on the STJ contract model. #102902
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Update UnwindRegistersRestore.S #102901
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • fix NetworkInterface properties on Windows #102900
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Update armv6 image #102899
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Propagate profile flags to loop preheaders in `Compiler::optCloneLoops` #102897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable sending activation to dispatch queue threads #102887
    blocked, area-PAL-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix Infinite loop on OdbcDataReader.internalGetString with UTF-8 text #102885
    area-System.Data.Odbc, community-contribution
  • Add fast path for linq count with predicate #102884
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Removes the redundant external condition #102883
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Enable NativeAOT runtime tests on MacCatalyst #102882
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Update docs.microsoft.com usages to learn.microsoft.com #102881
    documentation, area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Replace legacy __sync intrinsics with __atomic ones #102879
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Restrict the maximum length of BigInteger #102874
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix computing new EH ranges in SubstitutedILProvider #102870
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use `MemoryMarshal.CreateSpan` instead of `Span` pointer constructor in Number.NumberBuffer.cs #102866
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] Merge #92901 #102862
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Added SVE LoadVector*NonFaultingZeroExtendTo* APIs #102860
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Avoid a few allocations in JsonContent #102859
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Ensure LoaderAllocator can't be collected while we clean handles on collectible LoaderAllocators #102872
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Implement GetThreadStoreData in cDAC #102404
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update Span.cs and ReadOnlySpan.cs to specify zero-based index values #102877
    documentation, area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Make span args to SearchValues.Create be params #102831
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/9.0-preview5] Fix STJ support for System.Reflection.NullabilityInfoContext.IsSupported = false #102876
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json
  • Revert linux_bionic image to unblock the official build #102849
    area-Infrastructure
  • Keep metadata for rooted members in ILLink #102850
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix incorrect metadata token written for array, pointer populated from TypeBuilder #102786
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [RISC-V] Fix Interop/StructPacking/StructPacking.dll Failure #102864
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add regression test for assembly origin for event marking #102836
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Content-Length header not always returned when enumerating HttpContentHeaders #102416
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Update llvm-libunwind to v18 #102231
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure that GenTreeIntrinsic doesn't incorrectly overwrite the gtEntryPoint #102843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix STJ support for System.Reflection.NullabilityInfoContext.IsSupported = false #102852
    area-System.Text.Json
  • JIT: Add reasoning about loop trip counts and optimize counted loops into downwards counted loops #102261
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Propagate the 'this' keyword in LibraryImports #102793
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add ActivitySource Tags #102678
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 9.0.0
  • Call NuGetAuthenticate after SetupNuGetSources #102846
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2463803 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Use `where T : allows ref struct` in runtime #102795
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Add Base64url encoding/decoding #102364
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix `UnsafeAccessor`s with enum fields #102853
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0
  • Allow shuffle and other hwintrinsic that require a constant to stay intrinsic if the operand becomes constant later #102827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ILLink: Sweep .override for interface method if the .interfaceImpl is removed #102857
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Enable RuntimeType.GenericCache to hold multiple types of cache entries #102034
    area-System.Runtime, runtime-coreclr
  • JIT: Propagate `LCL_ADDR` nodes during local morph #102808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NO REVIEW]Activate some H/3 tests and make usage of ConfigureAwait(false) more consistent on H/3 #102699
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • `Activator.CreateInstance` supports ByRefLike types #102636
    area-System.Runtime, 9.0.0
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Baseline failing reflection and Regressions tests #102812
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use ``BitOperations`` in couple more places #101701
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Remove runtimeconfig.template.json from templates and provide it by default #102818
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove reserved registers from parameter homing temp reg candidates #102168
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use generic math for floating point formatting #102683
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • Delete -fms-extensions from coreclr native build #102834
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support TLS Resume with client certificates on Linux #102656
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix debugger support in WasmAppBuilder #100675
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [release/8.0-staging] Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #102063
    area-System.IO.Compression, 8.0.x
  • Fix config binding generator ValueType defaults #102733
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • TryAddWithoutValidation for multiple values could be more efficient #102845
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT][hybridglobalization] Run `HybridGlobalization` threading tests #102595
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • [release/8.0][Apple] Use NSLocale.preferredLanguages on for default locale name #102748
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x
  • [WIP][mono] Enable runtime tests in AOT modes on linux-arm64 #100685
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add System.Net.ServerSentEvents #102238
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: GetActiveElementCount #102813
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Improve early returns for HashSet SubSet and SetEquals methods #102758
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • forbid http request with invalid version #102423
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Convert our CryptoKit bindings to use Swift structs at the boundary #102583
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AbsoluteCompare* APIs #102611
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [wasm][wasi] Allow to build wasi in library mode #102806
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Make SocketsHttpHandler the default primary handler from HttpClientFactory #101808
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, 9.0.0
  • Don't query for negotiated ALPN protocol after renegotiation on Windows #102751
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/8.0] Fix NegotiateStream connections between Linux clients and Windows servers #102216
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • fix crossgen2determinism test #102742
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
